You show me something wonderful
but it is so painful to see
you taunt me with your false promises
you lift me up so high

you tell me im doing something right 
momennts later you condemn me for it 
you let the darkness swallow me 
then wonder why im sad
maybe you can't see how much i care
but that is your own ignorance
I have tried to show you 
you push me to my breaking point
then pull me back with your loving front
everytime i try to get away
you give me a reason not to go 
and all i want, my love, is freedom from your grip

I tried. 
Its funny i never thought i was the type of person who could be controlled, but while i was trying so hard not to let this happen i allowed myself to be totally oblivious as to how much my control my friends had over my life and who i was. 
Well, that was my mistake, maybe ill learn my lesson, after all how am i supposed to trust or care for someone when my best friend and my bf just told me in the same day that im not worth losing friends over.
I give up, my spirits so dead, but i dont even think this matters anymore, ill be leaving soon enough though, because i really cant handle this and i sure as hell cant handle it by myself.
If i said i didnt give a fuck i would be lying, i care about people, maybe a little to much, but i no longer have anything to look forward to inside myself or otherwise. 
All i can say is im soory to those who dont deserve my bitter attitude and thanx to the few that did try to help me. All i want and will welcome now is death. 
Im out 
~1~

im sitting here thinking 
and were trying again
i think we can beat this
i dont want it to end
i know if you love me
as much as you say 
then il make it through this
and i might be okay
im holding a hand now 
when i wasnt before
and i have your heart now
i dont want any more
but it cant be one sided
i need part of you 
if u really mean this
sounds to good to be true

some kind of warmth and security, for once nothings wrong and it scares me because with every calm there comes a storm, i have no idea what to expect nor do i care, i have fought my problems every time b4 and should they return and im sure they will i will fight them again.

I need a change, but to fulfill this feeling it will take a lot more then recustomizing my livejournal. 
Im tired of the only stability in life being pain and boredom, i cant sit still anymore nothings good enough for me. I don't even know how i feel so i can't explain it. I feel like im losing the only excitment in my life because im no longer speaking to someone i care for more then i thought i did. Im going under. I can no longer grasp the concept of happiness, it seems totally unrealistic. Im falling apart. I think i need some time to myself, to find myself, but i can't see that happening anytime soon. Superman doesnt get breaks why should i?
And what bothers me more then anything, is that im relizing i want someone that i shouldnt want. I really good friend that ive known for a while. Even if i could have this person it would stir up so much drama it may not even be worth it, so i want to make sure i really want it before i even think about saying something.
To sum it all up im confused, and i still don't know whats going on with Anson...

Well im done spilling my thoughts for the evening cause if u even read this far Im sure your bored by now anyway...

Im outties
~1~
